projectGridLines.title: Project 1  Title: Data Analyst: “Enhancing Price Prediction with XGBoost”, Project 2  Title: Process Analyst “Navigating the Pricing Landscape: Process & Data Approach
projectGridLines.description:
Project 1

Title: Data Analyst: “Enhancing Price Prediction with XGBoost”

Description: In the 2nd semester of 2023-24, a team of talented Computer Science students developed an innovative Price Prediction Algorithm using Python and XGBoost. Now, as a Data Analyst, your mission is to take over this codebase and elevate it to new heights. Here’s what awaits you:

  1. Simplification and Modularity: Streamline the existing code, making it more elegant and maintainable. Break down complex components into modular functions for better readability.
  2. Explainability: Dive deep into the algorithm’s inner workings. Uncover the “why” behind predictions by visualizing feature importance and model behavior. Explain it to stakeholders in a way that even non-technical folks can grasp.
  3. Optimization: Fine-tune the technical parameters of the XGBoost model. Explore hyperparameter tuning techniques to squeeze out every ounce of performance.
  4. Presentation Magic: Leverage Microsoft Co-Pilot to create stunning visualizations and simplified output formats. Transform raw predictions into actionable insights that decision-makers can easily digest.
  5. Automation Roadmap: Chart a course towards full automation. Imagine a workflow where price optimizations happen seamlessly, driven by data and algorithms. Your task is to make this vision a reality.

Expected learning: 

Specific courses required for project execution:  engineering

Project 2

Title: Process Analyst “Navigating the Pricing Landscape: Process & Data Approach

Description: As a Pricing Process Analyst, you’ll embark on a fascinating journey through the intricate world of pricing. Here’s what awaits you:

  1. Process Evaluation: Dive into various pricing processes—each a unique puzzle waiting to be solved. Evaluate their efficiency, identify bottlenecks, and propose improvements.
  2. Data Exploration: Unearth hidden gems within diverse datasets. Understand the nuances of pricing data across different markets. Your insights will be the compass guiding strategic decisions.
  3. Technical Solutions: Designing or Evaluating cutting-edge tools and techniques. Whether it’s statistical models, machine learning, or optimization algorithms, you’ll be the architect of pricing excellence.
  4. Documentation Mastery: Collaborate closely with Solution Analysts. Document processes, data flows, and landscape intricacies. Your work will be the treasure map for future explorers.
  5. Business Acumen: Your engineering background meets business acumen. Understand market dynamics, customer behavior, and competitive landscapes. Translate data into actionable insights.

Expected learning:


Specific courses required for project execution: management or engineering.
